anar

Class Recorder

java.lang.Object
  PGraphics3D
      anar.Recorder

public class Recorder
extends PGraphics3D

Recorder is converter from Processing graphics to Anar datastructure. It's used as standard recorder. Currently in Devloppment (not working yet...)
